response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. I am confident that you will find its benefits to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
